api_docs.name: Stripe API
api_docs.description: Stripe is a payment processing platform. Use the Stripe API to process payments, manage customers, subscriptions, and handle payment methods. Requires API key authentication.
api_docs.authentication: Bearer token (API key in Authorization header)

api_docs.name: OpenAI API
api_docs.description: OpenAI provides AI models for text generation, embeddings, and chat completions. Use for AI-powered features like text generation, summarization, and chat interfaces.
api_docs.authentication: Bearer token (API key in Authorization header)

api_docs.name: GitHub API
api_docs.description: GitHub API provides access to repositories, issues, pull requests, and user data. Use for GitHub integration features. Supports both authenticated and unauthenticated requests.
api_docs.authentication: Bearer token or Basic auth (optional for public data)

api_docs.name: Twilio API
api_docs.description: Twilio provides SMS, voice, and messaging services. Use for sending text messages, making phone calls, and managing communications.
api_docs.authentication: Basic auth (Account SID and Auth Token)

api_docs.name: SendGrid API
api_docs.description: SendGrid is an email delivery service. Use for sending transactional and marketing emails programmatically.
api_docs.authentication: Bearer token (API key)

api_docs.name: OpenWeather API
api_docs.description: OpenWeather provides weather data and forecasts. Use for weather-related features like current conditions, forecasts, and weather maps.
api_docs.authentication: API key as query parameter

api_docs.name: Google Translate API
api_docs.description: Google Cloud Translation API provides language translation services. Use for translating text between languages.
api_docs.authentication: Bearer token (OAuth 2.0) or API key

api_docs.name: Alpha Vantage
api_docs.description: Alpha Vantage provides stock market data, forex, and cryptocurrency data. Use for financial data features like stock prices, technical indicators, and market analysis.
api_docs.authentication: API key as query parameter

common_endpoints.description: Query with function parameter (TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY, GLOBAL_QUOTE, etc.)

api_docs.name: Spotify API
api_docs.description: Spotify Web API provides access to Spotify music data including tracks, albums, playlists, and user data. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token)

api_docs.name: Twitter API
api_docs.description: Twitter API (now X API) provides access to tweets, users, and Twitter data. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication with Bearer token.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 Bearer token

api_docs.name: YouTube API
api_docs.description: YouTube Data API provides access to YouTube videos, channels, playlists, and comments. Requires API key or OAuth 2.0.
api_docs.authentication: API key as query parameter or OAuth 2.0

api_docs.name: Google Maps API
api_docs.description: Google Maps Platform provides geocoding, places, directions, and maps services. Use for location-based features, maps, and geocoding.
api_docs.authentication: API key as query parameter

api_docs.name: Gmail API
api_docs.description: Gmail API provides programmatic access to Gmail mailboxes. Send emails, read messages, manage labels, modify messages, and manage email settings. Part of Google Workspace. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication and appropriate scopes.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Gmail scopes like gmail.readonly, gmail.send, gmail.modify)

api_docs.name: Google Drive API
api_docs.description: Google Drive API provides programmatic access to Google Drive files and folders. Upload, download, search, share, and manage files. Supports Google Workspace files (Docs, Sheets, Slides) and regular files. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Drive scopes like drive.file, drive.readonly, drive)

api_docs.name: Google Calendar API
api_docs.description: Google Calendar API provides access to Google Calendar data. Create, read, update, and delete calendar events. Manage multiple calendars, set event reminders, handle recurring events, and manage attendees. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Calendar scopes like calendar, calendar.events, calendar.readonly)

api_docs.name: Google Sheets API
api_docs.description: Google Sheets API provides programmatic access to Google Sheets spreadsheets. Read and write cell values, manage sheets, format cells, create charts, and perform spreadsheet operations. Part of Google Workspace. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Sheets scopes like spreadsheets, spreadsheets.readonly)

api_docs.name: Google Docs API
api_docs.description: Google Docs API provides programmatic access to Google Docs documents. Create, read, and update document content. Insert text, images, and tables. Apply formatting and styles. Manage document structure. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Docs scopes like documents, documents.readonly)

api_docs.name: Google Tasks API
api_docs.description: Google Tasks API provides access to Google Tasks. Create, read, update, and delete tasks and task lists. Manage due dates, notes, and task status. Integrate task management into your applications. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Tasks scopes like tasks, tasks.readonly)

common_endpoints.description: List tasks in a task list

api_docs.name: Google Chat API
api_docs.description: Google Chat API allows you to build Chat apps and bots. Send messages, create cards, handle interactions, and integrate with Google Chat spaces. Build automation and workflow tools for Google Workspace teams. Requires OAuth 2.0 or service account authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 or Service Account (Bearer token with Chat scopes)

api_docs.name: Admin SDK API
api_docs.description: Google Admin SDK API provides administrative control over Google Workspace domain and users. Manage users, groups, organizational units, devices, and domain settings. Audit user activity and generate reports. Requires admin privileges and OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 with admin privileges (Bearer token with Admin SDK scopes)

api_docs.name: Google Meet API
api_docs.description: Google Meet API (part of Google Workspace) allows you to create and manage video meetings programmatically. Create meeting spaces, get meeting details, manage participants, and integrate Google Meet into your applications. Requires Google Cloud project with Meet API enabled and OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Google Workspace scopes)

api_docs.name: Google Slides API
api_docs.description: Google Slides API provides programmatic access to Google Slides presentations. Create, read, and update presentations. Add slides, insert text, images, and shapes. Apply formatting and manage presentation structure. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Slides scopes like presentations, presentations.readonly)

api_docs.name: Google Forms API
api_docs.description: Google Forms API provides programmatic access to Google Forms. Create forms, add questions, retrieve responses, and manage form settings. Build form automation and integrate form data into your workflows. Requires OAuth 2.0 authentication.
api_docs.authentication: OAuth 2.0 (Bearer token with Forms scopes like forms.body, forms.responses.readonly)
